Gradient Vector Light

By Eric Londaits

Font information

Family Gradient Vector Light
Style Regular
Version Version 1.003;Fontself Maker 3.5.1
Copyright @ 2020 IMAGINARY gGmbH
License SIL Open Font License (OFL)
License URL https://opensource.org/licenses/OFL-1.1
This font was created with Fontself Maker and these web font files with Fontself Catapult.

How to use your webfont

  1. Upload the web font files to your server
  2. Add the code to your CSS stylesheet
    3.             
@font-face {
  font-family: 'gradient-vector-light';
  src: url('gradient-vector-light-webfont.woff2') format('woff2'),
  url('gradient-vector-light-webfont.woff') format('woff');
  font-weight: normal;
  font-style: normal;
}

.fs-gradient-vector-light {
  font-family: 'gradient-vector-light';
}
  3. Apply the font family to your text(s)
    4.             
h1 {
  font-family: 'gradient-vector-light';
}
Remember to adjust the links to the web font files in the CSS if font files are located in a different folder.
